# RSAMersenneFactorization
Factorize two product of mersenne primes  

The factorization tool take input of mersenne primes. The input file is in the format of `serial spaces exponent`  
The time complexity of this algorithm is O((number of mersenne)^2).  
More about mersenne prims read [REF](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mersenne_prime)  

**How to use**  

**tool**

Input from stdin  
```bash
  ruby ./mersennefactorization -n N
```
Input from file  
```bash
  ruby ./mersennefactorization -f ./test/test.pub
```

**api**
```ruby
#input from code
n = 
ff = MersenneFactorization.new n
p ff.exploit

#input from file
ff = MersenneFactorization.new
ff.file_input "./test/test.pub"
p ff.exploit
```
